title: "AWS She Builds bridges the great IT gender gap"
excerpt: "In response to these challenges, Amazon Web Services launched the AWS She Builds initiative in 2018, with two major goals: to raise awareness of the gender diversity gap in IT and to find ways to create a more diverse culture to bridge that gap for female career development in the technology community."
